definition: see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms

sentences.english: There are usually no dorsal pores in the first few intersegmental grooves.
sentences.chinese: 身体前几个节间沟内经常无背孔。

sentences.english: The variation extent of internode length is the Maximum in population, while that of spikelet number is the minimum.
sentences.chinese: 种群内变异幅度最大和最小的分别为节间长和小穗数。

sentences.english: It has slender leaves and long internode.
sentences.chinese: 叶片较窄，平展而细长，略下披，节间较长。

sentences.english: This is formed by the swollen lowest rachilla internode and adnate lower glume.
sentences.chinese: 膨胀的最低的小穗轴节间和贴生的更低的颖片形成这。

sentences.english: The genetic parameters of intercalary lengths of sorghum are changed regularly.
sentences.chinese: 高粱茎秆节间长度的遗传参数呈现有规律的变化。

sentences.english: Node and internode are initiated from transition zone.
sentences.chinese: 节与节间由过渡区细胞分化产生。

sentences.english: A through truss composite beam model with 4 panels is designed and made.
sentences.chinese: 设计制作一个4节间下承式桁梁结合梁模型。

sentences.english: The intersegmental and multisegmental muscles of the lumbar spine.
sentences.chinese: 肌肉对腰椎节间和多节段。

sentences.english: Stems with prominent nodes and internodes.

definition: terminal bud (growing at the tip of a plant)
axillary bud/bud growing from axil of plant
